name: Hung Viet Pham
content: Hung Viet Pham - Hung Viet Pham Hung Viet PhamAssistant Professor at York University, interested in Software Engineering and Machine Learning Follow Toronto, Canada Email Bitbucket Github Google ScholarI am an Assistant Professor at the Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science at York University. My work applies software engineering testing techniques to ensure the reliability of machine learning and deep learning systems. My research interests include software testing, program repair, software engineering, and machine learning.PublicationsTOSEM-24 - Journal History-Driven Fuzzing For Deep Learning Libraries Nima Shiri Harzevili, Mohammad Mahdi Mohajer, Moshi Wei, Hung Viet Pham, and Song WangAIware-24 Effectiveness of ChatGPT for Static Analysis: How Far Are We?
